Text: Hmm, where could Dr. \n Brahman and Kali be...?
Heard he pulled some bad \n stuff and ran off.
Can you believe Dr. \n Brahman turned out to be \n such a beast?
The town should toss \n those machines off the \n edge!
Well, you can't blame \n a machine for how \n someone uses it...
I guess you just never \n know with people, do \n you?
I guess not...
He was so smart, so \n handsome, so mature...
I thought he was the \n answer to all our \n prayers.
The most important thing \n now is to find Brahman!
How can I ever trust \n anyone again?
I can't believe I really \n thought that criminal \n was a beautiful angel.

Those pure, white wings 
 I believed in were 
 stained dark with 
 blood...
Thanks to Brahman and \n Kali, the police \n department's a mess!
I burned all the \n pictures I took of Kali \n Angel.

But I'm no good with 
 machines. I'll leave 
 dealing with them in 
 Chaz's capable hands.
That guy who made those \n round machines and \n became the mayor...
We can't just stop the \n city defense project.
Where could Brahman and Kali have gone?
Miss Kat! I was just \n looking for you.
Me? Are Raven and Cecie \n all done?

Yes, they've been 
 registered, but Cecie 
 came down with 
 something...
She's resting in the \n precinct's first-aid \n station.
Is she gonna be okay?
The doctor said she's \n just exhausted and needs \n her rest.
Raven's with her, she'll \n be fine.
O-Okay. I guess I'd \n better let her rest \n then.

By the way, I've been 
 pursuing the 
 investigation on 
 Brahman...
And it seems that in the \n time since D'nelica \n resigned as mayor...
Brahman has been behind \n a lot of unsolved cases.
In particular, the one \n you and the others \n were involved in-
The accident with the \n runaway gravity engine \n in Neu Hiraleon, and-
The Missing \n Orphans Case.
Miss Kat, \n how did you-?
Scanning for \n compatibles...
Find Where the Grigos are Going
Scanning for \n compatibles...
Grigos?
What's going on with the Grigos?
Wow, look at all of 'em!
I should let Chaz handle it, I need to follow those Grigos.
I have to track down the Grigos!
Compatibles? Brahman \n used that term before in \n his research notes...
Miss Kat! Track down \n those Grigos!
I'll head to the station \n and check on the others.
You just take care of \n the Grigos!
I'm on 'em!
Raven! \n Wh-What's \n going on?
It's pretty obvious. The \n Grigos just went on the \n attack.
Cecie's still in the \n building.
Don't just sit there, \n help us!
Right!
No, they'll get inside \n the station!
If they do, they'll get \n Cecie!
Kali! \n What are you \n doing here?

Oh, me? Well, I have 
 some important 
 business - you 
 wouldn't understand.

Business? So it's you 
 and Brahman behind 
 what's going on with the 
 Grigos.
What are you \n up to now?

AAAH! Don't you ever 
 shut up? 
 "What" this... 
 "Why" that...
All that matters is Dad \n found my sister!
I hate you so much, and \n now we don't need you \n anymore!
She's lost it, let's \n just take her down.
Cecie!
Who's... calling me?
Conducting scan. \n Scan match found!
What are those crystals?
Sister, wait! \n Don't run.
What's going on \n with Cecie?
Kat, Raven, leave the \n rest of this to the \n police.
Go after Cecie.
If Kali's after her, \n she's in trouble.
Right, I'll make sure \n she's safe.
You again! Why are you \n following me?
Because you're after \n Cecie!
Stop meddling in things \n you don't understand.
She needs me, I'm the \n only one who can make \n her happy.
I'm not playing around!
Here she comes...
I am Durga Angel!
Why are you running? \n There's nothing to be \n afraid of, it's me.
S-Sorry, I had trouble \n remembering...
I've been here the whole \n time, doing Dad's work \n for both of us.
I remember now... \n We promised Dad.
It's been so long... \n I thought you'd \n never come home.
Look at me. When you \n left, you were older. \n Now I'm older.
And you were such a \n little girl, cute little \n Kali.
You remember. \n Welcome home, \n Durga.
They're tough! I can \n barely handle them even \n with you here, Raven.
We have to find a way to \n snap Cecie out of it.
Yeah, but how?
We have to fight her.
B-But that's Cecie!
If you want her back, we \n don't have a choice!
It's not pleasant, \n but we've got to try. \n For her.
Rrr!
Protect the Police
The Grigos wiped them out!
I have to help them!
Police Officer: \n Everyone, stay inside!
Police Officer: \n What's going on with the Grigos?
Police Officer: \n Are they after our headquarters?
Police Officer: \n Protect HQ! Open fire!
Defeat Kali
What are you doing? What did you mean by "sister"?
Kali: \n What's it to you? Just stay out of this.
Where's Brahman? What's he up to?
Kali: \n ...
I have to stop Kali!
Follow Kali
Where's Cecie?
I need to find Cecie before Kali does.
Cecie... What happened?
Kali: \n Sister! I've finally found you.
I need to find Cecie before Kali does.
Defeat Kali
I have to stop Kali!
Defeat Kali Angel \n and Bring Cecie Back
Cecie, what's going on?
Cecie, please, snap out of it.
Durga: \n ...
Raven: \n Something's wrong, my attacks aren't connecting.
Kali: \n Haha, there's nothing you can do about it either.
Raven: \n Kat, no more hesitating...
Raven: \n We have to stop Cecie.
Attack Durga to \n Revive Cecie
It's not working...
Raven: \n Then you know what we have to do.
I have to help Cecie!
If this keeps up, the police are done for.
I have to protect the police...
More Grigos are heading for the police station!
Officers
